name: Kidera - Tree of Legends
description:
Kidera - The Tree of Legends

This Game is made for the Metroidvania Month Jam 17

I worked on the Game Solo.  Leveldesign, Coding etc. is all done by me.

Only the music was made by Deep Solar - thanks a lot for the great Background-Music!

The most art Assets are from Ansimuz - a very talented Pixelartist, I love his Art and like to work with it alot!

I add alot of assets my self to fill in missing assets.

if you want to get your own Squirrel  buy one on Amazon -> SquirrelFluff  (not affiliate) just a joke.

Since I went on a vaccation for 10 days the Tree is 3/4 finished - didn t manage to make all of it, I am very sorry!

I hope you have a lot of fun exploring and playing.

Depending on the feedback I get,  I will work further on this Project.
